typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as integer '000',
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source22
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source22 aggregate(Column_1 = count(Column_1),
		Column_3 = sum(Column_3)) ~> Aggregate1
source22, Aggregate1 union(byName: false)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
